history.narrative: Law 18-375, the “Disorderly Conduct Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-425, which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 23, 2010, and December 7, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 19, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 18-699 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-375 became effective on May 26, 2011.
